techmeme.title: Tel Aviv-based Firefly, which provides cloud asset management with an infrastructure-as-code solution, raised a $23M Series A led by Vertex (Ingrid Lunden/TechCrunch)
Profile of Anthropic and its CEO Dario Amodei; the company prioritizes AI safety over profit, hoping it can spark a "race to the top" on safety in the industry (Billy Perrigo/TIME)
Intel, Google, Microsoft, Meta and others form the Ultra Accelerator Link Promoter Group to promote an industry standard to connect AI accelerator server chips (Kyle Wiggers/TechCrunch)
Fidelity raised the value of its X position by 4.4% to $5.51M in April; since Elon Musk's October 2022 Twitter takeover, the position has been marked down ~72% (Dana Wollman/Bloomberg)
Google and Magic Leap partner to work on building immersive experiences that blend the physical and digital worlds, but offer few details (Katie Paul/Reuters)
